name: Vent Field
description: An area of underwater geothermal vents creates unique ecosystems and potential sources of valuable minerals. The extreme conditions create unique research opportunities, while the heat and toxic chemicals create constant danger.
atmosphere: Superheated water erupts from seafloor vents while mineral-rich plumes create underwater chimneys teeming with unique life. Black smokers belch toxic chemicals and valuable minerals as extreme temperatures create harsh but fertile conditions. Sulfur scents mark the location. Alien ecosystem thrives in the crushing depths.
